description: UserInfo holds the information about the user needed to implement the user.Info interface.

username.description: The name that uniquely identifies this user among all active users.

uid.description: A unique value that identifies this user across time. If this user is deleted and another user by the same name is added, they will have different UIDs.

groups.description: The names of groups this user is a part of.

extra.description: Any additional information provided by the authenticator.
